data-set.BadAnswer: /Wrong answer/It's not the correct answer/This is not correct
data-set.Date: /what day are we/what is the date/the date
data-set.DidntUnderstand: /I didn't understand. Could you please repeat ?/Could you repeat please?/ I couldn't hear you well, would you mind reformulating?/Could you repeat please?
data-set.Game: /play/game/I want to play/I wanna play/let's play
data-set.HeadLeft: /head left/head to the left/look left/head on left
data-set.HeadRight: /head right/head to the right/look right/head on right
data-set.Hour: /what time is it/give me the time/what is the time
data-set.ICouldnt: /I couldn't/I could not/I didn't manage to
data-set.Meteo: /what is the weather like/weather/temperature/is it raining
data-set.MoveLeft: /turn left/turn to the left/go to the left/go left/rotate left/rotate to the left
data-set.MoveRight: /turn right/turn to the right/go to the right/go right/rotate right/rotate to the right
data-set.Question: /question/request
data-set.Recipe: /recipe/cooking application/I want to cook/help me to cook/I want to cook something
data-set.Refuse: /no/nope/disagree/cancel/nope/i don't want/this will do/it's not necessary/it is not necessary
data-set.Repeat: /repeat/i didn't hear you well/i didn't hear you/i didn't understand/say again/what did you say
data-set.RepeatAfterMe: /repeat after me/say this/say that/repeat this/repeat that
data-set.RLGL: /red light green light /red light green light/red light/redlight/greenlight/green light
data-set.SeveralRes: /I found several answers/there are several answers/Several answers are available
data-set.Story: /Tell me a story/I want a story/i want to hear a story
data-set.URWelcome: /you're welcome/The pleasure is mine/No problem/my pleasure/my goal is to help you
data-set.Volume: What is the volume/give me the volume/volume level
data-set.WantToKnow: /What do you want to know ?/What is your question?/How may I help you?/What is your request?
